version_description: Thanks to your feedback, this version includes an initial set of improvements to the performance of the application. Tile movement should now be faster and more responsive.
Thanks to your feedback, this version includes an initial set of improvements to the performance of the application. Tile movement should now be faster and more responsive.

New features in version 1.1 include:
- Swipe anywhere to move tiles.
- Ads removed from the play screen.
- Design improvements with better scaling.
- Sounds with on/off switch.
- iPad version.

New features in version 1.1 include:
- Swipe anywhere to move tiles.
- Ads removed from the play screen.
- Design improvements with better scaling.
- Sounds with on/off switch.
- iPad version.

New features in version 2.0 include:
- Detailed statistics tracking.
- Streamlined “You Win” and “Game Over” screens.
- Top and bottom buffer to address accidental swipes.
- Performance improvements.

New features in version 2.0 include:
- Detailed statistics tracking.
- Streamlined “You Win” and “Game Over” screens.
- Top and bottom buffer to address accidental swipes.
- Performance improvements.

New features in version 3.0 include:
- Undo!
- Swipe improvements (no more false swipes).
- Design enhancements for iPhone X and iOS 11.
- Squashed some pesky bugs.

New features in version 3.0 include:
- Undo!
- Swipe improvements (no more false swipes).
- Design enhancements for iPhone X and iOS 11.
- Squashed some pesky bugs.

- Swipe Mode setting (choose Normal or Expert)
- Squashed a few more bugs

- Swipe Mode setting (choose Normal or Expert)
- Squashed a few more bugs
